newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Zurich airport Jan-Sept cargo traffic down 0.9 pct.
newsitem.headline: Zurich airport Jan-Sept cargo traffic down 0.9 pct.

text.p: Global cargo traffic handled at Zurich Airport in the first nine months of 1996 totalled 325,482 tonnes, a decrease of 0.9 percent on the same period last year, airport authority figures show.

Jan-Sept 1996 cargo traffic handled by Swiss airlines at Zurich Airport declined by 4.2 percent on 1995 levels to 178,426 tonnes while foreign carriers' volume slipped by 0.8 percent to 57,868 tonnes.
Trucked airfreight handled at Zurich Airport in the first nine months of the year grew by 6.4 percent on Jan-Sept 1995, to 89,188 tonnes, the airport authority said.
Jan-Sept 1996 postal traffic totalled 12,008 tonnes, a fall of 2.2 percent on the same period in 1995. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542-7706 Fax+44 171 542-5017
